website_summaries.verdict: If you love basil, this is the herb seed collection to get. Though it doesn't have the variety of other options on our list, it offers 8 types of basil.
pros: Customers rave about how fast and effectively these 8 types of non-GMO basil seeds grow and love the vibrant, healthy plants they produce
cons: If you want to plant more than just basil, check out others on our list instead

customer_reviews.title: All Basil Seed Good, Except Holy Basil
customer_reviews.text: I bought the basil collection and planted them all in seedling trays under lights in March. All sprouted and grew fine except the Holy Basil variety, which unfortunately was the seed I was most interested in. A couple of extraordinarily small Holy Basil seedlings emerged out of about 100 seed plantings, but they did not survive more than a few days. The rest of the basil varieties have been hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Humbletraveler

customer_reviews.title: These were PERFECT! Grew fast into healthy big plants. :)
customer_reviews.text: All germinated well and sprouted within 5 to 7 days... I grow these inside in winter and they grew very nice into healthy big plants in my southern exposure window..They are 4 months old now and I have been cutting and using them for the last several wks. First pick of lemon, limes, thai, lg leaf, and second pic dark opal and genovese in center.. LOVE BASIL..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is a lot of Basil!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted. Everything sprouted, tastes delicious. I only wish I had paid better attention to the directions. Mine are a bit overcrowded in containers too shallow. This is my first time growing basil, so I'm not going to be too hard on myself. The selection is fantastic, and I feel I have learned so much about the different flavors by actually growing them. The sweet and Thai are my favorites. Still not quite sure what I'm going to do with the Holy Basil, but will Google. Thanks, this was fun! Plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby McIlroy

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Received my packet about 2 weeks ago. Packaging was very attractive. Loved all the varieties of basil that came in the packet. Planted them immediately and had most of them sprout within the week. Still waiting on my Tulsi, but research shows that one takes some extra love. I received plenty of seeds to try different methods at a awesome price. First try was peat pods in a plastic terrarium. Not one of my Tulsi babies popped up. On to method number two: Potting soil, compost, and peat moss mix in the plastic terrarium. I love a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Variety of Basil
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying growing my own variety of basil. The selection was amazing. The sprout rate was almost 100%. I planned for some not sprouting and put multiple (4-5) in each cell of my planter. I had to separate them out because so many were viable. My children will be getting plants later this Spring. Thank you so much for the Thai, Holy, Lime and Lemon basil. They are hard to find at the plant nurseries.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Most seeds sprouted
customer_reviews.text: So far, really great seeds!! Almost every seed I planted germinated into a little seedling. Something is coming along and chewing holes in the leaves, and the seedlings are only about 2 inches tall. I will update the review once I have harvested the basil, however so far I am very impressed with the quality of seed and the rate of germination.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: great seed pack variety
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to keep my neighbors n mom and all the neighborhood basil lovers happy and to kind of spice up my basil lot as usually theres only a few kinds from the stores like italian sweet and purple so im pretty excited, all the seeds seemed pretty viable besides the lime seeds. the lime seeds had some pop up like a big tough plant and then the others didnt sprout till a week or two later. none the less absolutely great seeds. will update further with pics later this summer
customer_reviews.author: wew lad

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Highly!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, as promised. The seed packs have a lot of seeds in them! Sometimes when you buy seeds you can hardly find them in the package. These are well packed. Multiple great varieties. I shared one pack with a friend already. Planted my first pack yesterday. I hope to gather my own seeds for next year. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Collection
customer_reviews.text: This basil diversity panel is great all around. Easy to germinate, easy to maintain, and good for pollinators once they go to bloom I had never encountered lime basil before and was impressed that it genuinely tasted like lime zest and was distinct from the lemon basil grown right beside it.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Commuter

customer_reviews.title: These pop up so fast!
customer_reviews.text: If you want fast, delicious basil, and lots of varieties, this collection is perfect! I put them in my Aerogarden and these basil seeds are always the first thing to pop up -- latest batch was visible in 2 days. I swear, if you watch for a minute, you can SEE basil growing. Delicious, too! Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: growing within days
customer_reviews.text: I just started these seeds in a tiny plastic box (recycled from spinach bought at grocery store) and a little potting soil. After 3-4 days, 4 types of basil are already growing. Lovely value and a neat collection for home herb garden. Easy grow.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader and Book Collector

customer_reviews.title: Ready to plant
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried yet.... not time to plant yet... but I am excited to taste each plant when it is grown... Nice packaging... They also included a small packet of Ramsons, which has a lot of healing qualities and is a wild garlic.... looking forward to planting and harvesting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen K. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Good variety. Lots of seeds.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase and varieties so far. Germination has gone well; that's about all I know of the quality. I couldn't source lemon basil locally and there are a few varieties (lime, thai, and spicy globe) I haven't grown before so I thought this package would be worth spending money for seeds I already have. I can't give them 5 stars yet but updates to come.
customer_reviews.author: John P. ICT

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Nice little mix of seeds. They all have slightly different germination times, germination rates, and growth rates, so be patient and you'll have a nice little collection of herbs.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: A Great Collection
customer_reviews.text: The purple basil and Italian large leaf had a few issues in the sprouting department but the overall collection is great. All of the other varieties are thriving; the holy basil has recently begun to flower. I would definitely recommend this collection to anyone who loves basil.
customer_reviews.author: The Last Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: Hearty seeds that truly satisfy the seasoned gardener.
customer_reviews.text: All the seeds germinated in a satisfactory manner. If you're good at gardening, these seeds will provide you with the results that you will definitely expect from decent seed stock. You will have so much basil you could make 3 or 4 gallons of pesto just from the Sweet and Genovese varieties alone.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLA C

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Basil Collection
customer_reviews.text: Great starter basil collection for the price - the lime was one that our local nursery's didn't carry! - with a very high sprout rate (80%+ in less-than-ideal conditions).
customer_reviews.author: J. Ogroski

customer_reviews.title: They sprouted fine.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this was really my first attempt at anything that could be called gardening so the failures were likely my fault not the seeds. The germination rate was good, everything sprouted. After that I met with mixed survival rates, but as I said, that was likely more my fault than the seeds. Though the Holy Basil seems to be a bit on the scrawny side compared to everything else which is a shame as that's the one I wanted most. The others are transplant ready but the holy basil is only half an inch tall still.
customer_reviews.author: Chris White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have NEVER been successful with growing any plants from the store bought seed packets. I bought this package, the radish package, and their multiple herb package, and EVERYTHING is actually growing. Most of the seeds had sprouted (I am not sure if that is the proper terminology) within a week. In case you can not tell, I am beyond pleased with my purchase. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gill

customer_reviews.title: ... had a lush crop of basil just before the cool weather set in
customer_reviews.text: These seeds worked really well - I had a lush crop of basil just before the cool weather set in! The holy basil is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Bad Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Other seeds I planted came up when started indoors with natural light and a grow light. None of the basil seeds came up. Not sure why but a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, sprouted quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of basil seeds and the four types I’ve planted so far sprouted abundantly very quickly and are looking healthy. Time will tell on how they taste but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: l'grange

customer_reviews.title: A Must have in Every Garden- in or outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: I have always gotten this bundle. It is Excellent Quality with full flavor and sent. My kids will even use some for the popsicle they make, teas, and foods... once you regularly use these assorted basils- there is No way to go back to just one Basil! Thank You from my family to yours!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy Vento

customer_reviews.title: Everything I planted------- sprouted!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for selling a good product. Everything I planted has come up. These are winter herbs. I'm expecting a good variety of basil in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seeds. Excellent service. Support small business.  Much love
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tasted yet. But beautiful packaging. Clear labelling and quick delivery. In these difficult times growing something beautiful, fragrant and useful is amazing. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Antone

customer_reviews.title: All that grew were Elephant Ears
customer_reviews.text: I planted ALL of the packets throughout my garden and marked all the places. Waited, watered, waited, watered. I'm now the proud owner of 8 elephant ears, and not one basil plant. Not.a.one.
customer_reviews.author: KgRS

customer_reviews.title: Great batch of seeds
customer_reviews.text: These were great. They all germinated quickly and very well. I am super happy. Fun to experiment with different flavors. I am very happy with these.

customer_reviews.title: Basil Seed Sprouted ASAP
customer_reviews.text: I planted these seeds and they literally sprouted two days after I put them in the little starter pods. Not big enough to taste yet, but I really can't wait! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing seeds!
customer_reviews.text: This collection of basil seeds is great. All germinated fast within a week. Fragant and healthy plants. The item arrived on time. Each packet has full intructions. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, fast growing & yummy basil!
customer_reviews.text: I love basil and this is an awesome variety pack. It’s growing very healthy and I’ve already eaten a bunch but I have lots more seeds to keep planting, Yum!

customer_reviews.title: A true SUCCESS!!
customer_reviews.text: All 8 varieties, are doing great, I grow mine hydroponically. This technique is virtually fool proof, ( I messed up enough to figure it out) lol. This really is a great selection of basil at a steal of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck and Rose

customer_reviews.title: Basil
customer_reviews.text: Basil is our favorite and so far it has worked out they are sprouting now. I’ll update when I harvest :)

customer_reviews.title: Decent variety
customer_reviews.text: Decent variety pack, best ones are the sweet basil, lemon basil and Thai basil and my least favorite was the lime basil, it smells like lime but for some reason it tastes like anise seeds
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Seeds for Thai basil and holy basil
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find both the types of seeds I was looking for in one collection. I planted them in little pots on my kitchen windowsill and they are several inches tall now and smell great. I can’t wait to start cooking with them, and I’m sure it will be fun to try out the other seeds also.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Unique varieties, good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these seeds to use indoors hoping I'd have some basil to cook with over the winter. The selection was quite unique -- I love the varieties. I hope to have enough left over to plant outdoors in my garden in the spring. Definitely will buy from Seeds Needs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kmac188

customer_reviews.title: Dead seeds
customer_reviews.text: None of the seeds actually sprouted, but other seeds I have ordered from Amazon did just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Customer appreciation
customer_reviews.text: Amazing service, amazing people. Seeds are very healthy and they are out of ground already! I love the way they earned my appreciation by putting small thank you card and bonus card in the envelope. I will never choose other to order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gulnar

customer_reviews.title: Basil Seed Packet was a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Basil Seed Packet Collection was a great buy over purchasing these seeds separately. The germination rate of the seeds (8 different types of basil) was very good and we now have wonderful basil plants that are ready to produce in the garden. I was very happy with this purchase and I will order again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Gray-Vickrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Seeds - Great Variety!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing seed from Seed Needs for a couple of years. Their products are consistently high quality and I have no problem getting anything to germinate. This particular item is exciting because there are 8 types of basil in one package - and plenty of seeds for this year AND next year's basil garden.

customer_reviews.title: good germination
customer_reviews.text: excellent germination. very nice variety of basil . looking forward to lots of fresh basil this Summer.

customer_reviews.title: ... the holy basil has a 90% sprouting rate or better in grodan
customer_reviews.text: So far everything but the holy basil has a 90% sprouting rate or better in grodan. Holy basil is around 50% but that probably more about the tiny seeds from those plants than it is about the seed quality.

product_meta.title: Basil Seed Packet Collection (8 Individual Seed Packets) Non-GMO Seeds by Seed Needs
feature_bullets: Quality Basil seeds packaged by Seed Needs. Intended for the current and the following growing season. Packets are 3.25" wide by 4.50" tall and come with a full colored illustration on the front side, as well as detailed sowing instructions on the reverse.
This Basil seed assortment offers 4,000 seeds, collectively. Each variety of Basil offers a different flavor and smell.
Basil is seen as one of the most popular culinary herbs. The plants vary in height, from 6 inches to 24 inches tall and can be easily grown indoors or directly outdoors as well.

Basil herbs are categorized as annual flowering herbs. The plants will establish quickly from seed, producing edible leaves through the warm months of summer. The plants will then wilt soon after the harsh winter frost arrives.

All Basil seeds sold by Seed Needs are Non-GMO based seed products and are intended for the current & the following growing season. All seeds are produced from open pollinated plants, stored in a temperature controlled facility and constantly moved out due to popularity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
